short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to add grades to powerschool and see their effects.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a table to your powerschool so that you can add points and see how they affect your grade. It supports weighted categories and extra credit. Stop wondering about what your grade will be, know what it will be!
